attributes.action: Let anyone who was 16 at the age the smoking ban came in, to be able to continue smoking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that anyone who was 16/17 when the age was increased to 18 are having their rights taken away. it will also increase the ammount of smuggled tobacco that is bought in, as many of my companions are already taking to that idea. i am a smoker and i think that because i am 16 i should be allowed to smoke. if when under 16 year olds went to buy ciggerettes they were asked for I.D, no I.D no sale, then there would only be adult smokers. but what ever is done there will always be underage smoking.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
